attributes.additional_details: Schools must teach crucial life skills alongside academics. Subjects like cooking, finance, entrepreneurship, road safety and road signs are essential for real-world success, empowering students to navigate life confidently and responsibly.
attributes.background: It's imperative for the government to revise the school curriculum, prioritising the incorporation of essential life skills into education.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Create a new core subject of Life Skills for all secondary school students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647082
